messages.content:
a-frame vr, blue sky, green grass, arrow keys navigate, forest of 25 random trees in random colors random heights, 30 random flowers in random colors, 14 tiny random agent spheres move randomly once per second, inside each sphere is a vertical bar, on each bar is a small black line, at the ends of the line are orange balls, atop each vertical bar is a head made from a blue sphere and two white spheres for eyes with two black eyeballs
Make sure everything is in a single HTML file with embedded CSS and JS in a single code block to be used as a web app.
